blog.name: alrightsnaps
blog.title: darling, dearest, dead
blog.description:
«It is probable that falling in love was the most important thing that they ever accomplished, and they accomplished a number of quite important things..»
Marauders Era + TLAT trash. 
Daenerys Targaryen loyalist.
His Dark Materials. A Series of Unfortunate Events. 
Period drama and high fantasy enthusiast. Unhealthily obsessed with fierce, redheaded female characters.

summary: I detest Joan Kathleen Rowling for a great many reasons, her refusing to cast any non British and/or Irish actors in the...

tags: I dunno just felt like ranting I guess?
like thethings aren't known for logic mind you
want evidence of that? check their loud house videos
summary: Uhh....one, that thumbmail was never explained. Two, maybe some credit was given to people for creating the theories, but a lot...
caption:
Uhh….one, that thumbmail was never explained.

Two, maybe some credit was given to people for creating the theories, but a lot of the theories wont credited to their original creators- this has been pointed out at this point by a youtuber on youtube that thethings don’t credit people for theories a lot, and often dub them as ‘fans’ or 'people’ so yeah….stealing theories for the views y'all.

Three, a lot of these theories are bullshit- like they admitted number 10, the Ron is Dumbledore, theory got debunked by JKR and they only believe her debunking as that means Dumbledore had a crush on Hermione if this theory was canon….I mean, I guess that’s a pro for them as thank fuck they don’t like that shit. But then you got the two theories I’m gonna admit stood out to me, but I’d also like to point out they mentioned two facts people already know before watching this theory: Dumbledore is manipulative as fuck and isn’t all good (number 1) and that Neville is the chosen one….like we know that, IT WAS IN THE BOOK-

But anyway…..the two theories that stood out to me was: Ginny apparently love potioning Harry and Draco being a werewolf….wow….:

More under read more in case

*The love potion: as pointed out by users in the comments anyway- love potions don’t last long in the harry potter universe- yes Tom Riddle’s mother used one, but again, it didn’t last long and he left. By this logic of saying Ginny love-potioned Harry, they wouldn’t have had 3 kids in time before it broke- maybe one. Plus the timeline doesn’t add up, as by the time he noticed Ginny, Harry was searching for horcruxes, so where would she give him that love spell again? Plus the way its worded is that Harry apparently never noticed Ginny before….during the time he liked Cho or was busy at the time- its normal to notice other people after you get over your first crush- I’m not a huge fan of Ginny X Harry mind you as Cho did nothing to deserve being shitted upon in favour of Ginny- but this theory is BS, has no logic and seems to not have any research put into it outside of acting like Harry having another crush is suspicious.

*The Draco is a wearwolf theory- uhh….I mean, I’m pretty sure the theory by whoever made it is better explained or worded then how thethings did it, but the way thethings did it was…why. They used that Draco being sickly in Half Blood Prince and how he has never had a death eater mark shown in the movies/books and how a wolf was a friend of Draco’s family. One, I haven’t reached Half Blood Prince but with the power of spoilers and wiki, its confirmed Draco was looking sickly at that point in time as he was suddenly afraid of the task at hand- aka kill Dumbledore- and therefore, was mentally stressed out and a bit terrified, which combined, can make you look sickly but stress alone can make you go pale. Two, the books are in Harrys POV we must remember here and therefore maybe he never saw Draco’s mark, but also he may be an unofficial death eater who never got his mark, but again Pottermore confirmed years ago actually, that he was a death eater so he does have a mark, he just doesn’t show it. Three, a wearwolf being the family friend doesn’t mean he’d bite the family unless reasons, which apparently according to this video was punishment for Lucious but again….why bite Draco. And again, another theory that was debunked ages ago is put in this video….so…..wow…..

This channel’s Harry Potters videos are….art. In their own ways. I might check them all out….cause I like suffering. But here’s a hint to anyone who watches these videos: be prepared to question god, and that when its a theory made by thethings, you can tell cause they don’t research at all and therefore are making it up on the spot for the views.

Now excuse me, I’m gonna question that thumbmail a bit more……how would they be divorced at 17-18……

blog.name: palletprincess
blog.title: Favs are Forever!
blog.description: My place of escapism where I reblog a bunch of things that I like!

summary: So I see a lot of Slytherin  stans complaining about Dumbledore giving the house cup to Gryffindor at the end of Sorcerer's...
body:
So I see a lot of Slytherin stans complaining about Dumbledore giving the house cup to Gryffindor at the end of Sorcerer’s stone. Now first of all, let me make it clear that I also got sorted into Slytherin on Pottermore and have a bunch of favorite characters from that house, so it’s not that I am a hater or anything.

But I really want to know that:-

- You people complain about Ron being awarded fifty points. I ask, would even five hundred points would have been enough for the way he bravely agreed to sacrifice himself during the game of wizard chess? He could have gotten seriously hurt or worse died. Also, he managed to beat McGonagall’s chess set which isn’t a small accomplishment at all.

- You people complain about Hermione being awarded fifty points. I ask, would even five hundred points would have been enough for the way she solved Snape’s potion riddle? It wasn’t an easy task. They could have gotten poisoned if she had been wrong. So she definitely deserved her share of points.

- You people complain about Neville being awarded ten points, I ask would even hundred points be enough for the type of courage he showed? He was standing up to his own friends. Probably the only friends he had made in the school because he didn’t wanted them to lose any more house points. Isn’t that deserving of points?

- Finally, you complain about Harry being awarded sixty points. I ask whether even six hundred points would have been enough for the level of courage he displayed. He went to face Voldemort alone, knowing that he wasn’t trained enough or ready for that. Knowing fully well that he could die. All because he wanted to stop Voldemort. Did Harry really not deserve the points he got?

So there is no need to shit on Gryffindor just because your favorite house didn’t won the house cup. I am sick of all those jokes made about this last scene from the movie or the book. It feels like people are shitting on everything done by Harry, Ron, Hermione and Neville on that day, just because they are salty about Slytherin not winning.

blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:

Sirius: Well, if you learned anything from today, it won't be the truth!

summary: "I have already told you," said Snape smoothly, "that I have no further stocks of Veritaserum. Unless you wish to poison Potter...
body: “I have already told you,” said Snape smoothly, “that I have no further stocks of Veritaserum. Unless you wish to poison Potter - and I assure you, I would have the greatest sympathy with you if you did - I cannot help you.”

reblog.comment: “I have already told you,” said Snape smoothly, “that I have no further stocks of Veritaserum. Unless you wish to poison Potter - and I assure you, I would have the greatest sympathy with you if you did - I cannot help you.”

I still like hp but the more I look at the world the less I think I’d like to be there
still def want a wand tho u KNOW I do
summary: Sorry if this is weird but if you're still into hp, what are your favorite Harry potter ships?
question: Sorry if this is weird but if you're still into hp, what are your favorite Harry potter ships?
answer: Super not weird! Happy to talk to you, Anon! 🤗 it’s a hard sell for me: I’m not a die-hard shipper of any one thing. I like Hinny, Hansy, Harmony, Drarry, Huna? Larry? I’ll really read anything if it grabs me. <strike>I always come back to Dramione tho if I’m being honest</strike>

summary:
Awesome that the hidden object game, ‘Fantastic Beasts: Cases from the Wizarding World’ gets the HP lore correct. 
Unicorn foals...
caption:
Awesome that the hidden object game, ‘Fantastic Beasts: Cases from the Wizarding World’ gets the HP lore correct.

Unicorn foals are pure gold. They turn silver when they’re about two years old. They grow horns at around four. At about seven years old, they’re fully grown and turn pure white.

https://www.hp-lexicon.org/creature/horse/unicorn/

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary: Hogwarts Meatgirl Catalogue
title: Hogwarts Meatgirl Catalogue
body:
by Aoi_Hikari

“Oh…” was all Harry could say startled by the embarrassing discovery. “A porn mag..?”
“What’s a porn mag?” Ron asked sounding genuinely unsure. “Is that a muggle thing?”
“You don’t have porn mags?” Harry wondered. “But what’s this then?”
“Ah, this”, Ron picked the booklet up. “It says ‘Hogwarts Meatgirl Catalogue’, see?” he said, pointing to the title.

Words: 8364, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death, Underage
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, Ginny Weasley
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley
  • Additional Tags: Guro, consensual guro, Cannibalism

summary:
And every fair from fair sometime declines,
By chance or nature's changing course untrimm'd
But thy eternal summer shall not...
caption:
And every fair from fair sometime declines,
By chance or nature’s changing course untrimm’d
But thy eternal summer shall not fade
Nor lose possession of that fair thou owest;
Nor shall Death brag thou wander'st in his shade,
When in eternal lines to time thou growest:
So long as men can breathe or eyes can see,
So long lives this and this gives life to thee.
